#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssOtbsFormatter _extends_ [ApiFormatterACssFormatter aCssFormatter] ==
This Formatter return an array of [ApiTokensACssToken tokens] formatted in [http://goo.gl/j4XdU OTBS (The One True Brace Style) indent style].
{{{
// Get parser tokens
$source = file_get_contents("path/to/source.css");
$tokens = CssMin::parse($source);
// Create the formatter with TAB as indent char and a declaration value padding of 32
$formatter = new CssOtbsFormatter(tokens, "\t", 32);
// Print the formatted source
echo "<pre>" . $formatter . "</pre>";
}}}
----
